segment.source: Get additional examples that demonstrate how to use the properties, methods, and events of the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries.
segment.target: Get additional examples that demonstrate how to use the properties, methods, and events of the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries.

segment.source: Code samples
segment.target: Code samples

segment.source: Code samples
segment.target: Code samples

segment.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive

segment.source: This section provides examples that demonstrate how to use the properties, methods, and events of the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries to target users, manually refresh ads, and handle events.
segment.target: This section provides examples that demonstrate how to use the properties, methods, and events of the AdControl and InterstitialAd classes in the Microsoft advertising libraries to target users, manually refresh ads, and handle events.

segment.source: For introductory walkthroughs that demonstrate how to add these controls to your app, see Developer walkthroughs.
segment.target: For introductory walkthroughs that demonstrate how to add these controls to your app, see Developer walkthroughs.

segment.source: For complete sample projects that demonstrate how to add banner and video interstitial ads to JavaScript/HTML apps and XAML apps using C# and C++, see the advertising samples on GitHub.
segment.target: For complete sample projects that demonstrate how to add banner and video interstitial ads to JavaScript/HTML apps and XAML apps using C# and C++, see the advertising samples on GitHub.
